title: Greenwich Bay Trading Co. Luxurious Hand Soap, 16 Ounce, Ocean Riche
description: "Since 1962, Greenwich Bay Trading Co. has been formulating and crafting luxurious vegetable soaps and spa essentials enriched with botanical butters, essential oils and natural extracts. From our roots in creating custom products for historic, New England inns, we have grown to offer luxury soaps, spa products and amenities to hospitality and retail businesses throughout the United States and abroad. We offer a full collection of private-label soaps, spa essentials and guest room amenities to inns, B&Bs and distinctive lodgings searching for luxurious products that, not only pamper their guests, but reflect their unique style."
